name: df-mwgfs
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(cmwgfs, crab(s0, cmfs, wal(s1, wal(s2, wal(s3, wi(wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s1), cv(s2), cv(s3)), cfv(cmax, cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(s3)), cfv(cmvt, cv(s0)))), wrex(s4, crn(cfv(cmsub, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s3), cima(cv(s4), cfv(cmsa, cv(s0)))))))))))
comment: Define the set of weakly grammatical formal systems. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2016.)
